lexUnit.name: counterfeit.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: made in exact imitation of something valuable with the intention to deceive or defraud.

sentence.text: Working with the Secret Service station at the American Embassy in Athens , DEA Nicosia now regularly employed huge sums of counterfeit US currency to make drug buys in Europe , the US and Mexico . "
